description: That's right. Reach --your-- /b/zenith/b/. The mechanics of this world are so intricate but powerful to the point you can completely reinvent yourself. The number of /b/enchantments/b/ available is enourmous allowing you to conquer the world.
Your gardens look a little... short? Well just wait, cause /b/sugarcane/b/, /b/bamboo/b/ and /b/cactus/b/ will grow extremely tall! Limits are boring!
Brewing potions is a great way to get into the spirit of becoming powerful by the power of /b/alchemy/b/! Brew up a storm and have a potion for every day of the week!

Villages will with teeming with life, so many professions to choose from. They're not the only ones who love to trade. Look out for /b/wandering traders/b/, they might have something sepcial in store for you! Take this to your advantage when progressing.

You will spend hours... no, days... no, months adventuring! The quality of rewards you can obtain from some of the super strong monsters that appear in the night will make it all worth it in the end. You can upgrade these rewards with sockets and get special abilities on them. You can use gems to further augment these /b/Affix/b/ items. Watch your six, and your one through twelve because you won't know what lurks until it's already too late.
